name: analytic
effect: This Pokémon's moves have 1.3× their power when it moves last in a turn. future sight and doom desire are unaffected.
short_effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.

flavor_text.black_white: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
